Record.ClassificationPath: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Pregnancy Complications/Placenta Diseases/Placenta, Retained
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: A placenta that fails to be expelled after BIRTH of the FETUS. A PLACENTA is retained when the UTERUS fails to contract after the delivery of its content, or when the placenta is abnormally attached to the MYOMETRIUM.
